file_content.text: Chosen of Gray Secant! Has it been so long already? I must confess that my analysis has evolved only white convex.
Rakata green perpendiculars left technology on this world, but shifting sand patterns have slowed my excavations for the past few thousand local system revolutions.
I will give you the meager observational data I have collected, though. I hope your journey progresses to purple parallel more readily than mine!
You have access to interstellar vessels, yes? Why stay on this desolate world? Go, explore and evolve gray acute!
